If you describe someone as **pushy**, you mean that they try in a forceful way to get things done as they would like or to increase their status or influence. 有进取心的

is the action of mimicking someone or something. 模仿

# ditto 

In informal English, you can use ditto to represent a word or phrase that you have just used in order to avoid repeating it. In written lists, ditto can be represented by ditto marks - the symbol " - underneath the word that you want to repeat. 同上 (可用同上符号（"）表示)
•  Lister's dead. Ditto three Miami drug dealers and a lady.
